members.signatureBeforeChange: public void setBounds (int x, int y, int width, int height)
members.signatureAfterChange: int setBounds (int x, int y, int width, int height, boolean move, boolean resize, boolean events)
diff: -public void setBounds (int x, int y, int width, int height) {
-	/* Bug in MacOS X. When setting the height of a bevel button
-	 * to a value less than 20, the button is drawn incorrectly.
-	 * The fix is to force the height to be greater than or equal to 20.
+int setBounds (int x, int y, int width, int height, boolean move, boolean resize, boolean events) {
+	* Bug in MacOS X. When setting the height of a bevel button
+	* to a value less than 20, the button is drawn incorrectly.
+	* The fix is to force the height to be greater than or equal to 20.
+	return super.setBounds (x, y, width, height, move, resize, events);
